channel.title: Devil is aroud on Aisan Translated Novels
channel.description: Recent content in Devil is aroud on Aisan Translated Novels

item.title: chapter1 I'm here to save the foreign people in dire straits.
item.description: Chen Zhao (zhao) dragged his suitcase out of the airport. I have heard that foreign people are living in dire straits, and in line with the idea of saving the world, they must come to save them. At the gate stood two women, one of whom was Chen Zhao’s mother and the other was a white woman who was her assistant, as if her name was Sally. Chen Zhao is an accident doctor, has had medical malpractice in China, has been unable to engage in related work in China.

item.title: chapter2 This Shapi is a demon?
chapter3 I am the demon lord of our village
chapter4 Be a supernumerary doctor
chapter5 First customer
item.description: If you want to get a medical license, you need to be familiar with the medical laws and rules on this side of the United States, which is equivalent to a new college entrance examination, which means that, Chen Zhao will not have a stable source of income for a long time to come. And their own money, certainly not enough to last that long. So on second thought, Chen Zhao decided to take Ethan’s advice.
